data.name: X4: Cradle of Humanity Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Enjoy our new soundtrack to the 2021 expansion "X4: Cradle of Humanity". Alexei Zakharov, renowned composer and producer of the X game series scores, delivers 17 brand new melodic tracks of a large scale. Immerse yourself in the soundworlds of the enlarged X4 universe.

Including three Bonus Tracks from the game's main menu as well as both X4: Cradle of Humanity trailers. Available as MP3 and FLAC.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Enjoy our new soundtrack to the 2021 expansion "X4: Cradle of Humanity" by Alexei Zakharov.
